card.name: CW - GCCW127 - Uploading app time out

data.text: That might be true but thereâ€™s a lot more happening on the server at the moment with the new additions of MBOD and Index 360. Iâ€™m currently investigating to limit the manual sorting application to use less resources and will ask @willemhuman to see if he can increase the timeout period on the upliftment application. Please ask them to upload 500 images at a time and let us know if those go through correctly. @gillianoberholzer @yasserogier @neilbosworth @cobuspienaar
